articles.title: NASA’s Perseverance rover to begin building Martian sample depot - IT-Online
articles.description: In the coming days, NASA’s Perseverance rover is expected to begin building the first sample depot on another world. This will mark a crucial milestone in the NASA-ESA (European Space Agency) Mars Sample Return campaign, which aims to bring Mars samples to Ea…

articles.title: Eamon Ryan hails EU agreement on natural gas price cap after months of wrangling - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Ryan said that it was vital that Europe remains united against energy supply being used as a ‘weapon of war.’
articles.content:
TRANSPORT MINISTER EAMON Ryan has welcomed the political agreement reached at the EU Energy Council for a price cap on natural gas to be introduced in the bloc of 180 euros per megawatt hour.
